p:
In Table 3, the initial susceptibility S
h (0) is estimated to be 0.55 (95% CI: 0.47-0.73) when η = 0.1, and 0.57 (95% CI: 0.46-0.74) when η = 0.3. The large overlap in the 95% CIs indicates that the two S
h (0) estimates are not statistically different. According to the 95% CIs of S
h (0), it is likely that over a quarter (i.e., > 25%) of the whole population were not involved in the 2015-16 ZIKV epidemic.
